mapper.select: select st_num, st_bm_id, bm_store_name as st_store_name, st_br_name, bm_num as st_bm_num, st_opentime, st_closetime, st_approval from store join manager on st_bm_id = bm_id where st_approval = #{st_approval}
mapper.insert: insert into store(st_br_name, st_opentime, st_closetime, st_contents, st_bm_id) values (#{plus.st_br_name}, #{plus.st_opentime}, #{plus.st_closetime}, #{plus.st_contents}, #{plus.st_bm_id})
insert into image(im_name, im_ori_name, im_tableName, im_tableNum) values(#{image.im_name}, #{image.im_ori_name}, #{image.im_tableName}, #{image.im_tableNum})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM store join manager on store.st_bm_num = manager.bm_num
